name: WENEW presents Andy Murray's Wimbledon 2013 Victory

metadata.description:
Andy Murray raises the Gentlemen's Singles Trophy after becoming Great Britain's first countryman in 77 years to win the Men's Singles Final.

From “Andy Murray’s Wimbledon 2013 Victory,” the first-ever NFT series by WENEW. This moment was limited to an edition of 20 and was sold with two Centre Court tickets to a Wimbledon 2022 game to take place during the first 10 days of the Fortnight, as well as a Physical Artifact of the Moment, and a Wimbledon 2021 poster signed by Andy.

Centre Court tickets are redeemable through WENEW (via support@we.new) by the deadline stated on the WENEW site, by the Collector who owns the NFT on March 1, 2022. The Collector may choose from the first 10 days of the Fortnight, to be agreed between the Collector and AELTC/Wimbledon.

For more information, visit [https://we.new/moments/andy-murray-celebrates-his-2013-wimbledon-victory](https://we.new/moments/andy-murray-celebrates-his-2013-wimbledon-victory).
metadata.name: The Trophy Ceremony #1 of 20
